desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.engine.viewer

Class SimulationTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.extensions.visualization2d.engine.viewer.SimulationTime

  • public class SimulationTime
extends java.lang.Object
    The simulationtime is allways computed from real system-time. The simulation-time-value is given by a long an can be interpreted in a java-typical way as a time-value. Normally the time runs with a specified speed. It's can started, halted (pause), continued and stopped. In a trace-mode the time can step from one value to the next.

      • SimulationTime

        public SimulationTime(long start,
                      long end,
                      double speed,
                      java.util.TimeZone timezone,
                      java.util.Locale locale)
        Constructor for SimulationTime
        Parameters:
        start - start-time
        end - end-time
        speed - SimulationTime runs speed times fast as natural time
        timezone - default is UTC
        locale - default is Locale.ENGLISH

        Parameters:

        format - timeformat for output
        Returns:
